竖体文字/竖体文字_0043.jpg.mt:
Offer you safety assurance

Every detail is meticulously crafted
Give you better solid protection

1. 304 stainless steel material
Sturdy and reliable
The handrail uses 304 stainless steel material to ensure the product's anti-aging performance and long-lasting internal tube life. It does not age easily and is not prone to rusting.
src: 扶手采用304不锈钢材质 保证成品的抗老化性能和持久的内管寿命 不易老化 不易生锈
